title: Weightages for Pessat
content: Hey there pes students, Cud ya pls help me out in my pessat prep, wid just a month left for pessat i wanna knw which are the important topics i gotta cover in this month to get max marks in pessat! Will rly appreciate the help. Thnx

comments.body: That said, I wrote mine while sleeping in the exam center for 15 minutes out of the 3 hours and still got a seat. Pro tip. Don't sleep and do the bare minimum. You will get iy
U meant pessat for b.tech right? Sry i didnt mention tht in my question. Anyways u r givin me confidence since im not prepared yet

Try getting into college through CET

But if it's difficult, then PESSAT has a syllabus similar to other entrance exams.. focus on getting questions right over attempting all questions

If you could provide some more details about the marking scheme, ig we can give more insights

You have to try getting in through CET.
Pessat has almost the same difficulty as KCET, slightly more the college claims but i feel it's the same. It is certainly not as difficult as Mains or KVPY.
I would focus a bit more on math and physics over chemistry. There is general aptitude or English section in the test too ig, so thats a easy section to score. I feel if you  prepare well for CET you will be ready for PESSAT.
